name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Tapestry of Genres and Global Talent**

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret continues its tradition of curating a bold and eclectic lineup, featuring 52 artists spanning a remarkable 47 genres. From the pulsating beats of electronic and house to the raw energy of post-punk and hardcore punk, and the soulful rhythms of R&B and Afrobeat, the festival celebrates a rich diversity of sounds. Notable genre representation includes electronic (6 acts), post-punk (5), hip-hop (5), and alternative rock (4), with niche styles like Afro-psychedelic funk, minimal synth, and UK garage adding unique flair to the lineup. With an average artist rating of 7.2, the festival promises a high-caliber experience for music lovers.

This year’s lineup draws from a truly global pool of talent, with artists hailing from 16 countries. While the USA (11 acts) and the Netherlands (10 acts) lead the charge, the festival also highlights voices from Ghana, South Africa, Brazil, and Tanzania, among others, reflecting a commitment to showcasing diverse cultural sounds. Gender representation is also a focus, with 9 female-led acts, 1 non-binary artist, and 9 mixed-gender groups joining the predominantly male lineup. Additionally, 12 acts feature artists of color, further emphasizing the festival's dedication to inclusivity.

In 2026, Best Kept Secret continues to serve as a melting pot of styles, cultures, and perspectives, creating a space where experimental rock, Afrobeat, and jazz can exist alongside indie rock and dream pop. With its thoughtful curation and celebration of diversity, the festival remains a must-visit destination for those seeking to discover hidden gems and cutting-edge sounds.
